original_text:
Fortunes of Egypt
Una civiltà millenaria carica di misteri, opere di architettura maestose, oro e pietre preziose, un culto religioso ricco di divinità: niente da dire, l’Antico Egitto è uno dei temi che più si presta al mondo dell’intrattenimento online.
Per non essere da meno rispetto alle altre software house, La IGT ha sfornato Fortunes of Egypt, una slot molto ben fatta che punta più sulla facilità del gameplay che sulla grafica. Con le slot di ultima generazione ci stiamo pian piano abituando a una definizione HD, con effetti sonori e animazioni di vario tipo, anche se questo non si traduce sempre in una giocabilità migliore, visto che i tempi tra una partita e l’altra inevitabilmente si allungano.
Entrando nello specifico, sullo sfondo di Fortunes of Egypt si intravedono due piramidi e una sfinge, con le linee di pagamento sistemate intorno alla cornice. Sulla parte alta sono visualizzati i jackpot disponibili, mentre in basso troviamo il costo di ogni linea, la scommessa totale, la vincita e i tasti Start e Autoplay.
Caratteristiche della slot
La griglia è una classica 5×3 su cui si snodano 25 linee di pagamento fisse. Su ogni linea possiamo scommettere tra 0,01 € e 0,40 €, un costo tutto sommato contenuto. Si possono scegliere 10, 20, 30, 40 o 50 giri automatici che si arresteranno in caso di vincita di un jackpot, del gioco bonus o dei free spins. Questa slot ha un RTP pari al 94,27% (ma a intervalli) e una volatilità media.
Simboli e funzionalità di Fortunes of Egypt
A differenza di tante altre slot, qui non abbiamo i simboli legati alla scala reale, ma solo tematici. La nave e il cobra sono quelli che pagano meno in assoluto, seguiti dalla pergamena e dallo schiavo. Con la sfinge e l’occhio di Horus le cifre cominciano a farsi interessanti anche se a pagare di più sono la chiave della vita, le piramidi e soprattutto la principessa egizia.
Il faraone è il nostro simbolo Wild e sostituisce tutti i simboli eccetto quelli speciali.
Il nostro Scatter, rappresentato dallo scarabeo, è molto ricco, infatti con 3 abbiamo diritto a 8 Free Spins, con 4 saliamo a 20 Free Spins e con 5 addirittura a 100! Durante ogni giro gratuito, tutte le vincite vengono raddoppiate, tranne quelle legate ai simboli speciali.
L’altro simbolo speciale è il forziere colmo di gioielli e ha una duplice funzionalità: innanzitutto è pagante, inoltre ogni volta che compare contribuisce al raggiungimento di una soglia che farà partire un gioco Bonus. In questo caso, l’omino dovrà camminare su un piano senza far cadere lo scrigno a terra.
L’altro simbolo speciale è quello Jackpot. Se ne compaiono 3, allora ci troveremo davanti 3 sarcofagi. Scegliendone uno, avremo la possibilità di vincere il Jackpot base, il Super Jackpot o il Grand Jackpot.

raw_translation.response:
Fortunes of Egypt is a well-crafted slot game that brings to life the mysterious and awe-inspiring Ancient Egyptian civilization, complete with majestic architecture, alluring gems, and a rich pantheon of gods. As an experienced gambler, you know that this theme has long been a favorite among online entertainment enthusiasts, and the IGT has done a great job with this particular offering. Rather than relying solely on stunning graphics and HD definition, Fortunes of Egypt focuses more on delivering a smooth and fast-paced gameplay experience. With 25 fixed paylines and a traditional 5x3 reel design, players can wager between €0.01 and €0.40 on each line, which is quite affordable. You can choose to play 10, 20, 30, 40, or 50 automatic spins that will stop in the event of a jackpot win, bonus game, or free spins. The game has an RTP of 94.27% (in intervals) and offers medium volatility. 

Unlike other slots that feature symbols based on the standard playing card ranks, Fortunes of Egypt uses only thematically relevant symbols. The ship and cobra symbols pay the least, followed by the parchment and slave symbols. The sphinx and the Eye of Horus symbols offer higher payouts, with the key of life, pyramids, and especially the Egyptian princess symbols paying out the most. The pharaoh symbol serves as the wild symbol and can substitute for all other symbols except special symbols. The scarab symbol acts as the scatter symbol and can trigger up to 100 free spins when at least 5 appear on the reels. During free spins, all winnings except for those from special symbols are doubled. There are two special symbols in Fortunes of Egypt: the jewel-filled treasure chest and the jackpot symbol. The treasure chest serves as a paying symbol and also contributes to unlocking a bonus game when it appears on the reels. In the bonus game, players must guide an adventurer across a platform to reach a treasure chest without dropping it. The jackpot symbol triggers a jackpot feature where players will choose one of three sarcophagi to potentially win a base, super, or grand jackpot. Overall, Fortunes of Egypt is an enjoyable and straightforward slot game that will appeal to players who prefer faster-paced, thematic gaming experiences rather than flashy animations and complex mechanics. As an experienced gambler, you'll appreciate the straightforward and rewarding gameplay mechanics that Fortunes of Egypt has to offer.

raw_translation.response:
Fortunes of Egypt

A civilization full of mysteries, majestic architectural works, gold and precious stones, and a rich religious cult of deities: we can't deny that Ancient Egypt is one of the most popular themes in the world of online entertainment.

To keep up with the other software houses, IGT has released Fortunes of Egypt, a well-made slot that focuses more on the ease of gameplay than on graphics. With the latest generation of slots, we are slowly getting used to HD definition, sound effects, and various animations, although this doesn't always translate into better playability since the time between games inevitably lengthens.

Specifically, Fortunes of Egypt has two pyramids and a sphinx in the background, with paylines arranged around the frame. The available jackpots are displayed at the top, while at the bottom, you will find the cost of each line, the total bet, the win, and the Start and Autoplay buttons.

Features of the slot

The grid is a classic 5x3 that has 25 fixed paylines. On each line, you can bet between € 0.01 and € 0.40, which is relatively low. You can choose between 10, 20, 30, 40, or 50 automatic spins, which will stop in case of winning a jackpot, a bonus game, or free spins. This slot has an RTP of 94.27% (at intervals) and medium volatility.

Symbols and features of Fortunes of Egypt

Unlike many other slots, Fortunes of Egypt features only thematic symbols rather than those related to the royal scale. The ship and the cobra are the lowest-paying symbols, followed by the scroll and the slave. The sphinx and the Eye of Horus start paying interesting sums, but the symbols that pay the most are the key of life, the pyramids, and especially the Egyptian princess.

The pharaoh is our Wild symbol and replaces all symbols except the special ones.

Our Scatter, represented by the scarab, is very rich. With 3, we're entitled to 8 free spins, with 4 we get 20 free spins, and with 5, we have 100! During each free spin, all winnings are doubled, except those related to special symbols.

The other special symbol is the jewelry-stuffed chest, which has dual functionality: it is a paying symbol, and every time it appears, it contributes to reaching a threshold that triggers a bonus game. In this case, the little man must walk on a plane without dropping the chest to the ground.

The other special symbol is the Jackpot. If three appear, we'll face three coffins. Choosing one will give us the chance to win the base jackpot, the super jackpot, or the grand jackpot.

Review: Fortunes of Egypt

A civilization full of mysteries, majestic architectural works, gold and precious stones, and a rich religious cult of deities: we can't deny that Ancient Egypt is one of the most popular themes in the world of online entertainment.

To keep up with the other software houses, IGT has released Fortunes of Egypt, a well-made slot that focuses more on the ease of gameplay than on graphics. With the latest generation of slots, we are slowly getting used to HD definition, sound effects, and various animations, although this doesn't always translate into better playability since the time between games inevitably lengthens.

Specifically, Fortunes of Egypt has two pyramids and a sphinx in the background, with paylines arranged around the frame. The available jackpots are displayed at the top, while at the bottom, you will find the cost of each line, the total bet, the win, and the Start and Autoplay buttons.

Features of the slot

The grid is a classic 5x3 that has 25 fixed paylines. On each line, you can bet between € 0.01 and € 0.40, which is relatively low. You can choose between 10, 20, 30, 40, or 50 automatic spins, which will stop in case of winning a jackpot, a bonus game, or free spins. This slot has an RTP of 94.27% (at intervals) and medium volatility.

Symbols and features of Fortunes of Egypt

Unlike many other slots, Fortunes of Egypt features only thematic symbols rather than those related to the royal scale. The ship and the cobra are the lowest-paying symbols, followed by the scroll and the slave. The sphinx and the Eye of Horus start paying interesting sums, but the symbols that pay the most are the key of life, the pyramids, and especially the Egyptian princess.

The pharaoh is our Wild symbol and replaces all symbols except the special ones.

Our Scatter, represented by the scarab, is very rich. With 3, we're entitled to 8 free spins, with 4 we get 20 free spins, and with 5, we have 100! During each free spin, all winnings are doubled, except those related to special symbols.

The other special symbol is the jewelry-stuffed chest, which has dual functionality: it is a paying symbol, and every time it appears, it contributes to reaching a threshold that triggers a bonus game. In this case, the little man must walk on a plane without dropping the chest to the ground.

The other special symbol is the Jackpot. If three appear, we'll face three coffins. Choosing one will give us the chance to win the base jackpot, the super jackpot, or the grand jackpot.

response.headline: Ancient Treasures: Symbols and Their Values
response.content:
Step into the world of the Pharaohs with Fortunes of Egypt, the online casino slot game. The symbols in this game take you into the world of ancient Egypt and its hidden treasures. You won’t find the usual royal symbols here: instead, you’ll be playing with thematic symbols that make you feel like you’re exploring the depths of a pyramid and discovering the secrets within.

Of course, every symbol has its own value, and it’s good to know which ones to aim for. The lowest paying symbols are the ship and the cobra, which couldn't be less ominous. Then we have the scroll and the slave, which aren't necessarily winners, but they're still worth keeping. It’s worth noting that as the value of the symbols increase, so do the rewards. The sphinx and the Eye of Horus start paying out some interesting sums, but the symbols that pay the most are the key of life, the pyramids, and- drumroll- the Egyptian princess! If you're lucky enough to land her, you'll be laughing your way to the bank!

But wait, there’s more! The Pharaoh is the Wild symbol and can substitute any other symbol to create winning combos. The mighty scarab beetle is the Scatter symbol, and if you land three or more, you’ll trigger a bonus game in which you can win free spins. However, the symbol that stands out from the rest is the jewelry-stuffed chest. Not only is it a paying symbol, but it also helps to trigger the game's bonus feature. So keep your eyes peeled for this beauty as it could lead you to that big treasure you’ve been searching for.

So grab your hat and whip, and let's discover ancient treasures together with Fortunes of Egypt. Just remember, if a boulder starts rolling your way, don’t panic- you're not Indiana Jones... yet.

Theme and Design

Fortunes of Egypt is an online slot game developed by IGT with an Ancient Egyptian theme. The game has a background featuring two pyramids and a sphinx. The paylines are arranged around the frame, and the available jackpots are displayed at the top of the screen.

Gameplay Features

The game has a classic 5x3 grid with 25 fixed paylines. Players can bet between € 0.01 and € 0.40 on each line. The game features both Start and Autoplay buttons. Players can choose between 10, 20, 30, 40, or 50 automatic spins that will stop in case of winning a jackpot, a bonus game, or free spins. Fortunes of Egypt is a medium volatility slot with an RTP of 94.27%.

Paylines and RTP

Fortunes of Egypt is a 5x3 online slot game with 25 fixed paylines. Players can bet between € 0.01 and € 0.40 on each line. The game has an RTP of 94.27% and medium volatility.

Symbols and their Values

Fortunes of Egypt features thematic symbols, rather than those related to the royal scale. The lowest-paying symbols are the ship and the cobra, followed by the scroll and the slave. The sphinx and the Eye of Horus start paying interesting sums, but the symbols that pay the most are the key of life, the pyramids, and especially the Egyptian princess. The pharaoh is the Wild symbol, and the scarab is the Scatter symbol. The special symbol is the jewelry-stuffed chest, which has dual functionality: it is a paying symbol and contributes to triggering a bonus game whenever it appears.

Jackpots and Bonus Features

Fortunes of Egypt has three jackpots: the base, the super, and the grand jackpot. The special Jackpot symbol triggers the jackpot game, where players choose between three coffins. Choosing one gives players the chance to win one of the three jackpots. With three Scatter symbols, players get 8 free spins, with four they get 20, and with five, they get 100. During each free spin, all winnings are doubled, except those related to special symbols. The other special symbol is the jewelry-stuffed chest, which triggers a bonus game where players need to keep the chest from falling to the ground while the little man walks on a plane.

Review:
 
Slot game basics

Fortunes of Egypt features a 5x3 grid with 25 fixed paylines, where players can place bets between €0.01 and €0.40 on each line. The game has an RTP of 94.27% (at intervals) and medium volatility. Players can also choose between 10, 20, 30, 40, or 50 automatic spins, which will stop in case of winning a jackpot, a bonus game, or free spins.

Theme and symbols

The game is set in Ancient Egypt and features thematic symbols such as the ship, cobra, scroll, slave, sphinx, Eye of Horus, key of life, pyramids, and Egyptian princess. The pharaoh acts as the Wild symbol, while the Scatter symbol is represented by the scarab, and the bonus symbol by a chest full of jewels.

Bonus games and features

In addition to the regular symbols and Wilds, the game has two special symbols: the Scatter and the bonus symbol. The Scatter symbol awards players with free spins, where all winnings are doubled. The bonus symbol contributes to reaching a threshold that triggers a bonus game, where players must help a little man walk on a plane without dropping the chest to the ground.

Jackpot options

Fortunes of Egypt has a jackpot feature, triggered by the appearance of three jackpot symbols, where players can choose one of three coffins to win either the base jackpot, the super jackpot, or the grand jackpot.

Overall gameplay and experience

Fortunes of Egypt's graphics are simple yet effective, with the focus being more on the ease of gameplay and the available features. The slot's low bet limits may appeal to many players, while the dual functionality of the bonus symbol adds an extra layer of excitement to the game. The game's multiple features make for an entertaining experience overall.

Review: Fortunes of Egypt

A civilization full of mysteries, majestic architectural works, gold and precious stones, and a rich religious cult of deities: we can't deny that Ancient Egypt is one of the most popular themes in the world of online entertainment.

To keep up with the other software houses, IGT has released Fortunes of Egypt, a well-made slot that focuses more on the ease of gameplay than on graphics. With the latest generation of slots, we are slowly getting used to HD definition, sound effects, and various animations, although this doesn't always translate into better playability since the time between games inevitably lengthens.

Specifically, Fortunes of Egypt has two pyramids and a sphinx in the background, with paylines arranged around the frame. The available jackpots are displayed at the top, while at the bottom, you will find the cost of each line, the total bet, the win, and the Start and Autoplay buttons.

Features of the slot

The grid is a classic 5x3 that has 25 fixed paylines. On each line, you can bet between € 0.01 and € 0.40, which is relatively low. You can choose between 10, 20, 30, 40, or 50 automatic spins, which will stop in case of winning a jackpot, a bonus game, or free spins. This slot has an RTP of 94.27% (at intervals) and medium volatility.

Symbols and features of Fortunes of Egypt

Unlike many other slots, Fortunes of Egypt features only thematic symbols rather than those related to the royal scale. The ship and the cobra are the lowest-paying symbols, followed by the scroll and the slave. The sphinx and the Eye of Horus start paying interesting sums, but the symbols that pay the most are the key of life, the pyramids, and especially the Egyptian princess.

The pharaoh is our Wild symbol and replaces all symbols except the special ones.

Our Scatter, represented by the scarab, is very rich. With 3, we're entitled to 8 free spins, with 4 we get 20 free spins, and with 5, we have 100! During each free spin, all winnings are doubled, except those related to special symbols.

The other special symbol is the jewelry-stuffed chest, which has dual functionality: it is a paying symbol, and every time it appears, it contributes to reaching a threshold that triggers a bonus game. In this case, the little man must walk on a plane without dropping the chest to the ground.

The other special symbol is the Jackpot. If three appear, we'll face three coffins. Choosing one will give us the chance to win the base jackpot, the super jackpot, or the grand jackpot.
